description:
USN-4586-1 fixed vulnerabilities in PHP ImageMagick. This update
provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 16.04 ESM.

Original advisory details:

 It was discovered that PHP ImageMagick extension didn't check the address used
 by an array. An attacker could use this issue to cause PHP ImageMagick to
 crash, resulting in a denial of service.

php-imagick.description: PHP extension to create and modify images using the ImageMagick API

title: PHP ImageMagick vulnerability
action: In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
isummary: PHP ImageMagick could be made to crash if it received specially crafted input.
